mapper.update: update mg_base_user set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userPassword = #{userpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayName = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent = #{parent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, region = #{region,jdbcType=BIGINT}, zone = #{zone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, timeCreate = #{timecreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, timeModified = #{timemodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleteFlag = #{deleteflag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, timeDelete = #{timedelete,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select uid, userName, userPassword, displayName, phone, parent, region, zone, timeCreate, timeModified, deleteFlag, timeDelete from mg_base_user where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select uid, userName, userPassword, displayName, phone, parent, region, zone, timeCreate, timeModified, deleteFlag, timeDelete from mg_base_user order by age desc,username asc
